name: Sentry
description: Sentry is a realtime, platform-agnostic error logging and aggregation platform.

ADMINS.description: Set the email addresses that should be notified (comma separated, no spaces)

SENTRY_URL_PREFIX.description: Set the absolute URL to the Sentry root directory (no trailing slash)

SERVER_EMAIL.description: Set the reply-to email address for outgoing mail

SENTRY_KEY.description: Sentry's shared secret for global administration privileges

DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE.description: Django settings module to be used
